channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Video Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Video Station

item.title: CVE-2021-44055|2024-09-17T00:06:46.037Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- video%20station
item.description: An missing authorization vulnerability has been reported to affect QNAP device running Video Station. If exploited, this vulnerability allows remote attackers to access data or perform actions that they should not be allowed to perform. We have already fixed this vulnerability in the following versions of Video Station: Video Station 5.5.9 ( 2022/02/16 ) and later

item.title: CVE-2023-47563|2024-09-06T17:47:03.791Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- video%20station
item.description:
An OS command injection vulnerability has been reported to affect Video Station. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to execute commands via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: Video Station 5.8.2 and later

item.title: CVE-2023-50360|2024-09-06T17:46:27.496Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- video%20station
item.description:
A SQL injection vulnerability has been reported to affect Video Station. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to inject malicious code via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: Video Station 5.8.1 ( 2024/02/26 ) and later

item.title: CVE-2023-50360|2024-09-06T16:26:55.405Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- video%20station
item.description:
A SQL injection vulnerability has been reported to affect Video Station. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to inject malicious code via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: Video Station 5.8.1 ( 2024/02/26 ) and later

item.title: CVE-2023-47563|2024-09-06T16:26:50.074Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- video%20station
item.description:
An OS command injection vulnerability has been reported to affect Video Station. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to execute commands via a network.
